data.text:
Published 2:31 am Friday, August 2, 2024

The New Mexico Lobos are +30000 to take home the MWC title in 2024, according to bookmakers, which ranks them 11th in the conference. Below, we dive into the odds and dissect the trends you need to know before placing a futures bet.

Sign up for BetMGM to bet on New Mexico Lobos’ odds to win their conference or the national championship.

New Mexico Mountain West Conference and National Championship Odds

National Championship Odds: Currently Unavailable

Mountain West Conference Championship Odds: +30000 (Bet $10 to win $3,000.00)

Season Win Total Over/Under: 2.5 (Bet $10 to win $13.00 on the over with +130 odds)

Bet on New Mexico Lobos futures odds & games on BetMGM.

New Mexico 2024 Schedule

In terms of difficulty, using its opponents’ combined win total last season, New Mexico has been given the 48th-ranked schedule this year. In 2024, the Lobos will face seven teams that had winning records last season, including two that won nine or more games, while facing zero squads that notched three or fewer wins a season ago.

Watch New Mexico Lobos games all season long on Fubo!
